change.changenote: Regulation BEFORE repealed by BC Reg 192/2023, effective July 17, 2023.

reg:regulation.reg:title:
Petroleum and Natural Gas
Storage Reservoir Regulation

bcl:section.bcl:text: In this regulation, Act means the Petroleum and Natural Gas Act.
This regulation applies to the following:

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: the granting of an exploration licence under section 126 of the Act to explore for a storage reservoir;
the granting of a lease of a storage reservoir under section 130 of the Act.

bcl:section.bcl:text: This regulation does not apply to that area of British Columbia lying west of longitude 122° West, east of the Strait of Georgia, south of latitude 49°30' North and north of the Canada-United States of America border.

bcl:section.bcl:marginalnote: Application for a licence or lease
bcl:section.bcl:text: An application for a licence made under section 126 or for a lease under section 130 of the Act must include the information specified in section 12 of the British Columbia Oil and Gas Handbook.

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: for an exploration licence issued under section 126 of the Act, $500;
for a lease issued under section 130 of the Act, $200;

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: The annual rent for a lease is $7.50 per hectare

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: payable for the first year at the time of application for the lease, and
payable in each subsequent year on or before the anniversary date of the lease.

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: Subject to subsection (3), a lease expires 60 days after the rental payment is due if the lessee fails to pay the annual rent prescribed in subsection (1).

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: the annual rent, plus a late payment fee of $100, is paid within the first 10 days after the rental payment was due, or
the annual rent, plus a late payment fee of $500, is paid after the expiration of 10 days but before the expiration of 60 days after the rental payment was due.

reg:content.reg:provisionsnote: [Provisions relevant to the enactment of this regulation: Petroleum and Natural Gas Act, R.S.B.C. 1996, c. 361, sections 132 and 133]

change.changenote: Section 1 BEFORE amended by BC Reg 269/2010, effective October 4, 2010.

definition.def: means the Petroleum and Natural Gas Act;
means the Canadian Standards Association Standard Z341-93, Storage of Hydrocarbons in Underground Formations, July 1993, as amended from time to time.

change.changenote: Section 2 (c) BEFORE repealed by BC Reg 269/2010, effective October 4, 2010.

paragraph.paragraphtext: the granting of a storage licence under section 131 of the Act for the development or use of a storage reservoir for the storage of petroleum or natural gas.

change.changenote: Section 4 BEFORE amended by BC Reg 269/2010, effective October 4, 2010.

section.marginalnote: Application for a licence or lease
section.sectiontext: An application for a licence made under section 126 or 131 or for a lease under section 130 of the Act must include the information specified in section 12 of the British Columbia Oil and Gas Handbook.

change.changenote: Section 5 BEFORE repealed by BC Reg 269/2010, effective October 4, 2010.

section.sectiontext: For a licence issued under section 131 of the Act, the commission may require that the underground storage project be designed, constructed, operated and abandoned in accordance with all or portions of CSA Standard Z341-93.
